short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple extension to allow typing html directly into the editor instead of using the wysiwyg editor.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: We started working on Basecamp and I needed to add some basic formatting to the text of the tasks and found it almost imposible with the current editor. When I found you could paste form another source some html formatted content I decided to venture myself into making a little extension to allow html insertion directly.
